summary: This document contains detailed financial information regarding Jeffrey Epstein's accounts at Deutsche Bank, including transaction summaries, asset allocations, and account balances as of February 2018. It highlights various transactions, income, and the overall financial status of Epstein's accounts, which are significant in the context of the ongoing investigations into his activities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary account holder at Deutsche Bank, with detailed financial transactions and account summaries provided in this document.

connections.description: Stewart Oldfield is the primary officer managing Jeffrey Epstein's financial accounts at Deutsche Bank.
Arthur Tendler is the custody officer responsible for overseeing the custody of assets in Jeffrey Epstein's account.

events.title: Account Summary
events.description: Summary of Jeffrey Epstein's financial transactions and account balances as of February 28, 2018.

events.title: Opening Balance
events.description: The document details the opening balance of Jeffrey Epstein's account as of February 1, 2018.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank had a closing balance of $162,158.48 as of February 28, 2018.
The account experienced a cash disbursement of $5,243.75 during the reporting period.
The account was managed by Stewart Oldfield as the primary officer and Arthur Tendler as the custody officer.
The document includes various transactions, including cash dividends and foreign currency exchanges.
There are disclaimers regarding the accuracy of the financial information and the responsibilities of the account holder.
